explains: v. 划伤；擦伤；刮痕（scratch 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: from scratch 白手起家；从头做起
start from scratch 从头开始；白手起家；从起跑线开始
up to scratch 达到标准
without a scratch 一点儿也没受伤，安然无恙
scratch the surface 只做了肤浅的研究；不深刻，不周详
scratch for oneself [美国口语]关心自身利益
scratch resistance 抗划伤；耐擦伤性
starting from scratch 白手起家；从零开始
scratch test 过敏性测验；划痕试验

sentences.en: Scratching by itself—that is, in the absence of an itch—had no such effect.
sentences.cn: 抓挠本身——即不养时——并无这样的效果。

sentences.en: The mongrel presented his muzzle for scratching.
sentences.cn: 这只杂种狗探出口鼻挠痒。
